column5: AWS Migration Evaluator builds a data-driven business case for migration to AWS
column6: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan.

column5: AWS Application Discovery Service collects server specification information, performance data, and details of running processes and network connections
column6: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Use your credits to evaluate beyond these limits: 1,000 applications per account

column5: AWS Migration Hub delivers a guided end-to-end migration and modernization journey through discovery, assessment, planning, and execution.
column6: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Organize resources into applications, obtain right-sized EC2 instance recommendations, and track the progress of your application migrations across multiple AWS and partner solutions.

column5: AWS Application Migration Service simplifies, expedites, and reduces the cost of migrating and modernizing applications.
column6: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Use your credits to evaluate beyond these monthly limits: Migrate an unlimited number of servers at no charge (for up to 90 days per server)

column5: AWS Database Migration Service helps you migrate databases to AWS quickly and securely.
column6: Use credits to access features in the Free and Paid plan, including: Maintain high availability and minimal downtime during migration. Discover, assess, convert, and migrate your database and analytics workloads with automated migration.
